data.name: LECTRO
data.detailed_description:
Overview

Lectro is an exciting new fast-paced shooter, parkour game with puzzles that require critical thinking in between the mayhem. Feel complete freedom with open options for completing levels, and have freedom in movement with unique mechanics including grappling, wall running and much more.

Gameplay Features

  • Unique, fast-paced movement including grappling, wall running, a hoverboard, and portals
  • Multi-path levels allowing for a new experience every time you play
  • Vast, beautiful environments, ranging from intricate labs to massive skyscraper cities
data.about_the_game:
Overview

Lectro is an exciting new fast-paced shooter, parkour game with puzzles that require critical thinking in between the mayhem. Feel complete freedom with open options for completing levels, and have freedom in movement with unique mechanics including grappling, wall running and much more.

Gameplay Features

  • Vast, beautiful environments, ranging from intricate labs to massive skyscraper cities
data.short_description: Can you help Lectro escape the scientists who have held him captive in ZYER Labs in this exciting FPS parkour-puzzle game? Assist Lectro traverse through exhilarating challenges by using a grappling gun, wall running, portals and much more to gain his freedom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
